title.narrative: Providing drinking water in the Republic of Niger.

description.narrative: - Drilling of (163) surface wells ranging from (20 to 30 meters). - Installation of 163 hand pumps.

1- Implementing sustainable activities to provide safe drinking water to (241,880 beneficiaries) by digging (163) surface wells. 2- Contribute to reducing the percentage of diseases resulting from drinking contaminated water. 3- Providing water for livestock, on which the economy of the population in the targeted areas depends. 4- To contribute to stabilizing the population and limiting desertion in order to obtain water sources. 5- Increasing sources of safe drinking water and personal use in dry areas. 6- An increase in the percentage of crop productivity in the targeted areas.
About (241,880) beneficiaries have access to safe drinking water and daily use in each of the following areas (Dosso / Tillaberi / Tawa).
